snippet.title: JOYVILLE 2 - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2963230/Joyville_2
Play Joyville Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2490790/Joyville/

Help us release Joyville 2 faster! https://patreon.com/kudplaygames
Join The Discord Server: https://discord.gg/BMSYG8yrS5
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KudPlay

Joyville 2 is a first-person horror-puzzle adventure game set in an abandoned children's camp. You will explore the camp and encounter its magical inhabitants. By solving puzzles and overcoming challenges, you will travel between two parallel worlds, uncovering the secrets of this enigmatic place.
